feeStoreDepositFeeAmount(bytes32,uint256.details: can only be executed from the fee store manager role

getCollectedFeesTotal().details: this is a cumulative number of all fees collected on this store until it get's send to the home chain

params._operator: address of account that is receiving fees if this contracts automations are failing

restoreFeesFromSendFees((uint256,address.details: this function restores the fees based on refunds from bridge providers, in case someone starts try to sync fees home and it's failing on the bridge sideif the fee config is not configured anymore, the funds that are getting restored, will be send to the operator

params._dto: data which is primarily used for sending fees to the home chain

syncFees((bytes32,uint256,address,uint8).details: it will check wheter an array is sufficient and add, updates or removes fee configs based on the fee sync action create by the fee manager

params._feeConfigSyncDTO: array of fee configs to process in the fee store

collectFeesFromFeeStore().notice: Sends the current collected fees to the Manager in case no bridge provider is working and the job needs to be done manually

getCollectedFeesByConfigId(bytes32).notice: Gets the collected fees for a specific fee id

getCollectedFeesTotal().notice: Gets the current collected total fees on this store

getFeeConfigIds().notice: Gets all fee config ids defined on this fee store

getFeeStoreConfig(bytes32).notice: Gets a fee store config based on the fee id

restoreFeesFromSendFees((uint256,address.notice: Restores fees which are actually intended to be sent to the home chain

userdoc.notice: every contract needs to take care of the fees they collect. ITS JUST STORAGE HERE
